results.name: Triangle read by rows, A007318 * (A129186 * (A001006 * 0^(n-k))
comment: Row sums = the Catalan numbers, A000108, starting with offset 1:
formula: Binomial transform of a bidiagonal matrix with (1,0,0,0,..,.) as the main
diagonal and A001006 as the subddiagonal starting (1, 2, 4, 9, 21, 51,...).
example: First few rows of the triangle =
